text: Justin Theroux and Nicole Brydon Bloom’s Romance Heats Up as They Attend a Wedding Together It seems 2024 may be the year of romance for Justin Theroux. While he keeps his romance with Nicole Brydon Bloom out of the public eye, insiders claim that their romance is hotter than ever, and they made this big step together. Despite their 23-year age gap, the insiders insist that they’re nuts about each other, so much so that Bloom took Theroux as her plus one to her twin sister Chrissy’s wedding in NYC on Dec 21, 2023. If you need any more proof that this happened, Bloom posted a series of photos from her sister’s big day to her Instagram. And in the eighth slide, we see Theroux smiling with Bloom, two other guests, and Theroux’s dog Kuma. The insider told Life & Style on Jan 5, 2024, that “When Nicole met Justin, they just hit it off. She’s nuts about him, and friends say Justin is pretty crazy about her, too.” So, it seems the two are closer than ever, especially since he was her plus one and even made it to her Instagram. It seems as though the pair have been dating for around a year, after first being seen together in Feb 2023. Since then, they’ve kept their romance on the low-key side, rarely making public appearances in New York City. In a previous interview with Esquire, he talked about how his previous marriage to Jennifer Aniston has made him want to stay quiet about his new romance. “People will always want to gossip and say things, but you have to find that balance. Me saying anything, even if it was something loving, it would just turn into a thing. So it’s a classic no-comment situation for me,” he said.
